mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NVL(USER_PWD, '') AS USER_PWD, NVL(USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, STATUS, REG_DATE) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{status}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
